name: Lycan Moon
description:
Use your sun crystal energy to power the 3 monuments to bring daylight and banish the monsters in the woods in this 3D survival/horror experimental game.

Recommended resolution: 1080 x 1920

Controls

  • WASD: Move
  • Right click: Crystal light
  • Left click: Action

Credits

Dominik Lussier-Marcotte - Game Design, Level Design, Digital Art, Modeling, VFX
Viktor Briceno - Programming
Luis Boscan - Programming
Dylan Rosenthal - Modeling
Jacob Kelly - Environment, Optimization

Lycan Moon is a prototype game that was made for a Dawson College class.
